quote.msg:
如果想轉載可以信賴嘅英文報導，請引用Hong Kong Free Press (HKFP)。
例子：
Police can access full details of injured protesters in hospital, says medical sector lawmaker following patient arrests

https://www.hongkongfp.com/2019/06/17/police-can-access-full-details-injured-protesters-hospital-says-medical-sector-lawmaker-following-patient-arrests/

quote.msg:
多謝意見 不過我怕一樣既話佢地會ignore
因大部分係網站網上既投稿 唔係through email
我擔心佢地會以為係同一個人
你覺得呢
係寫一封sample先,然後每個人按照你嗰封去改字眼
同意 咁樣會有效率好多 最重要係呼籲我地改字眼要大改
